predicate.note: Frames file for 'fetch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry get-13.5.1, other framed members include buy, catch, entitle, hire, lease, pick, reserve, save, seize, vote. Comparison with 'bring' and 'get'.

roleset.name: bring (back)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: It is possible then that Santa Fe's real estate -- even in a state imperiled by earthquakes -- could, one day, fetch a king's ransom.

roleset.note: Higher args are predicted but not expected.
